quest.name: Gleaner's Wish
journal:
 Quest Sync
The Viera gleaner is watching you with interest.
objectives: Speak with the elemental reactor operator.
Deliver the lantern crystal to the Viera gleaner.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: You're a visitor to Sharlayan, aren't you? You do have a worldly look about you...

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: As a gleaner, I, too, have journeyed far and wide. Tell me, where is the farthest you have ventured?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: The Far East.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Another world.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I cannot say.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: The Far East, the literal edge of the world... That is quite far indeed.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: Is that meant to be in jest? The look on your face tells me you're serious...

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: Oh? Is it someplace secret? I understand. I am sworn to secrecy in some of the Forum's matters, as well.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: Aye, you should do nicely.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: You see, I need a more experienced traveler to say a prayer for me before I leave for Gyr Abania.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: If you would do me the honor, the reactor operator by the tower to the south should have a lantern crystal prepared for the purpose.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: Please speak with the reactor operator, and he will furnish you with a lantern crystal.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04320
dialogue.text: Are you here for the crystal? I hope it does some good for that gleaner; those folks need all the luck they can get.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04320
dialogue.text: Lanterns light the way through the darkness─a tool which can mean the difference between life and death. They are synonymous with safe passage, and as such, it has become custom in recent days to imbue the crystals inside with the prayers of a more seasoned traveler.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04320
dialogue.text: And today, that traveler is you. Simply face the crystal, and pray for the safety of the traveler-to-be, if you will.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04320
dialogue.text: Gaze into the crystal, and pray for the traveler who sent you.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crystal glitters inside the box. Kneel before it and pray for the gleaner's safe passage.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04320
dialogue.text: A colleague recently told me about the power of akasa─a concept taught in Radz–at–Han─and how it reacts to strong emotion.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04320
dialogue.text: I wonder if this method of praying to a crystal is a manifestation of that power...

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04320
dialogue.text: Well, that should about do it. With luck, your prayers will help guide the gleaner safely through the perils of his journey.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04320
dialogue.text: The crystal is ready. You can take it to the gleaner who asked for it now.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: Do you have a lantern crystal for me?

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: You have my thanks. With your prayer fueling its light, I have faith that it will keep me safe until my return.

dialogue.name: GLEANER04320
dialogue.text: And now, I depart for Gyr Abania. I hope your travels are successful, as well as mine.
